title: 이달의소녀탐구 #387 (LOONA TV #387)
members: Chuu, Choerry, YeoJin, Yves, Go Won, HeeJin, JinSoul, Olivia Hye
summary:
0:01 -- Chuu, Choerry, and YeoJin are outside goofing around. YeoJin's shoe comes off when she kicks the air.
0:10 -- Suddenly Yves and Go Won appear and everyone seems so energetic. They keep imitating HeeJin's commericial.
0:15 -- HeeJin shows it and YeoJin does the posture "Focus~". She keeps on doing it.
0:29 -- JinSoul joins in on the madness. Choerry messes up as she doesn't what it is. She does it again and fails.
0:46 -- Yves imitates her and OMG so elegant. HeeJin: "Just be chic and chill".
0:55 -- They all do it together now.
